pages.text: $(weapon)Sweeping Edge$() increases the damage of sweep attacks, allowing you to hit $(important)multiple enemies$() at once!$(br2)Only works with swords in Java Edition.

pages.title: Sweep Attacks
pages.text: Sweep attacks occur automatically when you hit an enemy while other enemies are nearby.$(br2)They appear as a particle effect!

pages.title: Damage Scaling
pages.text: $(li)No Sweeping: 1 damage to nearby enemies$(li)Level 1: 50% of main attack$(li)Level 2: 67% of main attack$(li)Level 3: 75% of main attack$(br2)Higher levels make sweeping almost as strong as direct hits!

pages.title: Crowd Control
pages.text: $(li)Clear zombie hordes$(li)Fight multiple mobs efficiently$(li)Great for mob farms$(li)Essential for adventure maps$(li)Combine with $(weapon)Fire Aspect$() to burn groups!$(br2)$(o)One swing, many casualties!$()
